alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 07 at 8:50AM MDT until June 08 at 2:45AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT THURSDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following county, Valley. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 842 AM MDT, Valley County Road Department reported continued flooding along portions of Bentonite Road. In addition, Bentonite Road between Canal Road and Tampico Road remains closed due to flood damage. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hinsdale, Tampico, Vandalia and The Bentonite Plant. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Unseen road damage is possible in areas where water is on top of the roads.
